title: Integration of Formal Methods and Machine Learning
author: Researcher Name

shards.name: Introduction
shards.content: This thesis explores the intersection of formal methods and machine learning.

shards.name: Problem Statement
shards.content: The fundamental challenge is bridging the gap between symbolic reasoning and neural learning.

shards.name: Research Gap
shards.content: Existing work lacks integration between formal verification and deep learning.

shards.name: Research Methodology
shards.content: We employ a mixed-methods approach combining formal analysis with empirical evaluation.

shards.name: Research Artifact
shards.content: A framework combining Coq verification with PyTorch neural networks.

shards.name: Evaluation
shards.content: Benchmarks show 95% improvement in verification time with acceptable loss in accuracy.
